default.$description: This is the color to replace in white label products. Dark mode recommended luminosity for SAGE is 75.1 (tested), but above 51.9 should be ok. See hsluv.org to be AAA text on 000000 bgs.

defaultAlt.$description: This is the color to replace in white label products. Ensure luminousity of custom color = 46.8 (see hsluv.org).  AAA against FFFFFF bg.

frozen.$description: Replace this color in white label products that use the FROZEN theme. Ensure luminousity of custom color = 46.8 (see hsluv.org). AAA against FFFFFF bg.

moderate.$description: was 0.5. Increased to 0.55 so that we can use this for hint text etc too, and still be accessible.

faint.$description: used on full page backgrounds as an alternative option

hoverAlt.$description: button hover on dark

withActive.$description: checkbox tick icon or radio handle

withHover.$description: text for draggable area on file input

hoverAlt.$description: bg hover for draggable area on file input

contentAlt.$description: Hint text, placeholder text, character count etc

mask.$description: full screen takeover token for modal dimmer

defaultAlt.$description: Disabled button backgrounds and borders ON DARK

icon.$description: Disabled icon inside buttons and form inputs.

defaultAlt.$description: Disabled input and button backgrounds, button borders and input backgrounds.

default.$description: Inversed disabled form secondary, tertiary and input borders borders.

content.$description: Inversed disabled text inside buttons and form inputs.

hoverAlt.$description: Accordion, secondary, tertiary, menu bg on hover
Accordion, secondary, tertiary, menu bg on hover

withActive.$description: use for marketing overrides for switch handle on standard

active.$description: needed for specific marketing usecase on light bg

defaultAlt.$description: default bg for left nav container

withActive.$description: text and icons on top of active bgs in nav contexts

activeAlt.$description: Active color for secondary and tertiary buttons
